solution_line_template: The total cost of all the pieces of furniture should be {cost_per_piece} * {num_pieces} = <<{cost_per_piece}*{num_pieces}={correct_total_cost}>>{correct_total_cost} dollars

Sally’s Woodworking LLC will reimburse Remy the difference between the total cost and the amount he paid, which is {amount_paid} - {correct_total_cost} = <<{amount_paid}-{correct_total_cost}={reimbursement_amount}>>{reimbursement_amount} dollars
